00029 #import <Foundation/Foundation.h>
00030 #import <QuartzCore/QuartzCore.h>
00031 #import <UIKit/UIKit.h>

00033 typedef enum _FTAnimationDirection {
00034   kFTAnimationTop = 0,
00035   kFTAnimationRight,
00036   kFTAnimationBottom,
00037   kFTAnimationLeft,
00038   kFTAnimationTopLeft,
00039   kFTAnimationTopRight,
00040   kFTAnimationBottomLeft,
00041   kFTAnimationBottomRight
00042 } FTAnimationDirection;

00067 #pragma mark Inline Functions

00069 static inline CGPoint FTAnimationOutOfViewCenterPoint(CGRect enclosingViewFrame, CGRect viewFrame, CGPoint viewCenter, FTAnimationDirection direction) {
00070         switch (direction) {
00071                 case kFTAnimationBottom: {
00072                         CGFloat extraOffset = viewFrame.size.height / 2;
00073                         return CGPointMake(viewCenter.x, enclosingViewFrame.size.height + extraOffset);
00074                         break;
00075                 }
00076                 case kFTAnimationTop: {
00077                         CGFloat extraOffset = viewFrame.size.height / 2;
00078                         return CGPointMake(viewCenter.x, enclosingViewFrame.origin.y - extraOffset);
00079                         break;
00080                 }
00081                 case kFTAnimationLeft: {
00082                         CGFloat extraOffset = viewFrame.size.width / 2;
00083                         return CGPointMake(enclosingViewFrame.origin.x - extraOffset, viewCenter.y);
00084                         break;
00085                 }
00086                 case kFTAnimationRight: {
00087                         CGFloat extraOffset = viewFrame.size.width / 2;
00088                         return CGPointMake(enclosingViewFrame.size.width + extraOffset, viewCenter.y);
00089                         break;
00090                 }
00091                 case kFTAnimationBottomLeft: {
00092                         CGFloat extraOffsetHeight = viewFrame.size.height / 2;
00093                         CGFloat extraOffsetWidth = viewFrame.size.width / 2;
00094                         return CGPointMake(enclosingViewFrame.origin.x - extraOffsetWidth, enclosingViewFrame.size.height + extraOffsetHeight);
00095                         break;
00096                 }
00097                 case kFTAnimationTopLeft: {
00098                         CGFloat extraOffsetHeight = viewFrame.size.height / 2;
00099                         CGFloat extraOffsetWidth = viewFrame.size.width / 2;
00100                         return CGPointMake(enclosingViewFrame.origin.x - extraOffsetWidth, enclosingViewFrame.origin.y - extraOffsetHeight);
00101                         break;
00102                 }
00103                 case kFTAnimationBottomRight: {
00104                         CGFloat extraOffsetHeight = viewFrame.size.height / 2;
00105                         CGFloat extraOffsetWidth = viewFrame.size.width / 2;
00106                         return CGPointMake(enclosingViewFrame.size.width + extraOffsetWidth, enclosingViewFrame.size.height + extraOffsetHeight);
00107                         break;
00108                 }
00109                 case kFTAnimationTopRight: {
00110                         CGFloat extraOffsetHeight = viewFrame.size.height / 2;
00111                         CGFloat extraOffsetWidth = viewFrame.size.width / 2;
00112                         return CGPointMake(enclosingViewFrame.size.width + extraOffsetWidth, enclosingViewFrame.origin.y - extraOffsetHeight);
00113                         break;
00114                 }
00115         }
00116         return CGPointZero;
00117 }
00118 
00119 static inline CGPoint FTAnimationOffscreenCenterPoint(CGRect viewFrame, CGPoint viewCenter, FTAnimationDirection direction) {
00120   CGRect screenRect = [[UIScreen mainScreen] bounds];
00121   if (UIInterfaceOrientationIsLandscape([[UIApplication sharedApplication] statusBarOrientation])) {
00122     CGFloat swap = screenRect.size.height;
00123     screenRect.size.height = screenRect.size.width;
00124     screenRect.size.width = swap;
00125   } 
00126   switch (direction) {
00127     case kFTAnimationBottom: {
00128       CGFloat extraOffset = viewFrame.size.height / 2;
00129       return CGPointMake(viewCenter.x, screenRect.size.height + extraOffset);
00130       break;
00131     }
00132     case kFTAnimationTop: {
00133       CGFloat extraOffset = viewFrame.size.height / 2;
00134       return CGPointMake(viewCenter.x, screenRect.origin.y - extraOffset);
00135       break;
00136     }
00137     case kFTAnimationLeft: {
00138       CGFloat extraOffset = viewFrame.size.width / 2;
00139       return CGPointMake(screenRect.origin.x - extraOffset, viewCenter.y);
00140       break;
00141     }
00142     case kFTAnimationRight: {
00143       CGFloat extraOffset = viewFrame.size.width / 2;
00144       return CGPointMake(screenRect.size.width + extraOffset, viewCenter.y);
00145       break;
00146     }
00147     default:
00148       break;
00149   }
00150         return FTAnimationOutOfViewCenterPoint([[UIScreen mainScreen] bounds], viewFrame, viewCenter, direction);
00151 }
